top_comments.comment: the more i see ash, the more excited i get for this season. the map is super cool looking and seems higher tier like olympus is. the car is cool too but ash is the highlight of the season for me. her design is amazing and abilities look so good!

4:26 TGM: "How have i not found a Backpack yet?"
4:13 *litteraly first Supply Bin has an Backpack and he walks away from it*
This is stupid, now you kill animals! This game is getting worse.
The mirage was hacking i saw he had a lifeline ult for a moment!

Question..does the AI only attack the team that triggers them, or any nearby player? If I'm being chased or wanting to push in the right area, can I shoot the eggs with a team close by to get them attacked?
